MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Slamannan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.19pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Binniehill Road substation and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:05pm on Saturday 20th February 2021.
